alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Wythe (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:38PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pulaski and northeastern Wythe Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1238 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grahams Forge, or near Max Meadows, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pulaski... Max Meadows... Allisonia... Patterson... Fort Chiswell... Draper... and Grahams Forge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
